class.name: FileSystemDock
class.brief_description: Godot editor's dock for managing files in the project.
class.description: This class is available only in [EditorPlugin]s and can't be instantiated. You can access it using [method EditorInterface.get_file_system_dock]. While [FileSystemDock] doesn't expose any methods for file manipulation, it can listen for various file-related signals.

method.name: navigate_to_path
method.description: Sets the given [param path] as currently selected, ensuring that the selected file/directory is visible.

method.name: remove_resource_tooltip_plugin
method.description: Removes an [EditorResourceTooltipPlugin]. Fails if the plugin wasn't previously added.

signal.name: display_mode_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the user switches file display mode or split mode.

signal.name: file_removed
signal.description: Emitted when the given [param file] was removed.

signal.name: files_moved
signal.description: Emitted when a file is moved from [param old_file] path to [param new_file] path.

signal.name: folder_moved
signal.description: Emitted when a folder is moved from [param old_folder] path to [param new_folder] path.

signal.name: folder_removed
signal.description: Emitted when the given [param folder] was removed.

signal.name: inherit
signal.description: Emitted when a new scene is created that inherits the scene at [param file] path.

signal.name: instantiate
signal.description: Emitted when the given scenes are being instantiated in the editor.

signal.name: resource_removed
signal.description: Emitted when an external [param resource] had its file removed.
